About Me Skills Projects

About me

Hi! I'm Alex, a Software Engineer from Galicia, a region in the north west of Spain.

I've been working professionally in software development since approximately 2011. But it's a whole life that I've been an enthusiast of technologies... since I was very young.

I'm a Senior Backend Developer, although I'm spending time learning everything I can about frontend in order to define myself someday as a fullstack. I'm a person with a technical profile, after all it is what I like the most, but I have also collaborated in tasks related to project management. In this sense, I have been fortunate to work in companies that let me participate in all phases of project execution, allowing me to have a very broad vision of the entire software development process.

Most of my career I have worked as a programmer analyst, designing solutions for large-scale document management based on Alfresco Software. I have also done consulting work related to this document manager, participating in performance audits and technical training to IT departments.

Currently I work in the development team of BIC Cloud Workflow & BIC Cloud GRC. An integral solution for the design and automation of workflow processes, and its implementation for the management of controls and risks.

I really enjoy what I do, and that encourages me to keep improving everyday so as to become a better professional.

Skills

Projects

Some of the projects I have worked on

Xedoc

Java, JQuery, Alfresco, CMIS, Oracle...

The first Open System Architecture for Alfresco and healthcare. Provides components to meet the requirements of any healthcare repository. Web access, SOAP integration, interoperability with HL7, XDS & XCA, semantic search, digital signature, multiple repository management, etc…

More info

BIC Cloud Workflow & BIC Cloud GRC

Angular CLI, Spring Boot, Java 8, Docker, Rabbit MQ, jBPM...

BIC Cloud Workflow is a powerful and intuitive software on basis of newest technologies for the digitization of your administrative processes. On the other hand, BIC Cloud GRC extends BICCW providing everything needed to ensure reliable corporate-wide risk management.

BIC Cloud Workflow BIC Cloud GRC

Smart Government

Angular 5, Java, Spring Boot, Docker, PostgreSQL, Nuxeo...

The project aims to improve the efficiency of cities through information and communication technologies. The use of information collected through different means will allow the Administration to make optimal decisions and better use the assets of the city, as well as offer new services that adapt to their real demands. Smart Government goes beyond the capture of this data, since its mission is to apply artificial intelligence systems that interpret and relate all that information, to reach conclusions that could hardly reach a person.
